comment: komentari se ne obrađuju, komentar može biti bilo što i bilo gdje

startingItems.name: Keys
startingItems.description: These keys open something, I'm just not sure what.
startingItems.default: Not the right key for that. Or not the right lock?

startingItems.name: The Captain's log
startingItems.description: This log belonged to the Captain.

startingItems.name: A toy boat
startingItems.description: This toy boat is found nowhere in the game.

entrances.entrance: [position player 700 700] I can't believe I just got fired! > I really need to take a bath!
[animation player spr_viktor_phone_down] > Nobody's answering. > [if (test phone 1)] I need to find where I wrote Martin's phone number.
[animation player spr_viktor_phone_down] > He hung up... > Time to go out and conquer the world! [set phone 2]

combinations.look: I have no idea what these keys open. Ok.
combinations.kick: Die, keys, die! [mood ljut] > [viktor spr_viktor_udara_lijevo] > Damn, can't reach them...
combinations.log: A... Keylogger? > Get it, get it!?
